item.title: Universal Physics Transformers: A Framework For Efficiently Scaling Neural Operators
item.description: Universal Physics Transformers (UPTs) offer a unified, scalable framework for efficiently training neural operators across diverse spatio-temporal physics problems, overcoming limitations of existing …
